entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -26.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Iqaluit Airport 10:00 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

Visibility: 48.3 km
Humidity: 71 %

Dewpoint: -30.6°C

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 27 with temperature rising to minus 23 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27 with temperature rising to minus 23 by morning. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. High minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022
